recipes.title: Vegan Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious vegan tacos made with spiced chickpeas, fresh veggies, and avocado.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing quinoa salad with cucumber, tomato, mint, and a lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: Hearty lentil soup with carrots, celery, and spices, perfect for a cozy meal.

recipes.title: Vegan Pizza
recipes.description: A crispy crust topped with tomato sauce, dairy-free cheese, and fresh basil.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with a savory mix of rice, black beans, and vegetables.

recipes.title: Vegan Brownies
recipes.description: Rich and fudgy vegan brownies made with cocoa and dairy-free chocolate chips.
